name: Escape from Gelanto
description:
Story
You are a slime by the name of Nozzo and habit the planet of Gelanto with your best friend Todd. One day, meteors emerge out of nowhere. Todd is quick to locate a gate to the emergency rocket, however they must survive a security system to access it. Will you and Todd make the way out together or will you both be crushed by the system?

Controls
Move Nozzo - WASD or Arrow Keys
Space Key - Proceed in dialogue

Credits
James Lillicrap - 3D Modelling/Lighting/Scene Assembly
Tatum Hobby - Concept Artist/Illustration/Background Models
Hibiki Takaku - Level Design/Music/Sound Design
Hyunwoo - UI/Game Mechanics
Jay Dumpson - Narrative Design/Dialogue
